title: Promise of Forever
description: Promise of Forever is the third book in the New York Times Bestselling three-book series  Promises.Book One: Promise to MarryBook Two: Promise to KeepBook Three: Promise of ForeverHe promised to always be my best friend. He promised to marry me if we were both still single at thirty. He promised me a forever together. But that was before I discovered a secret that seemed to shatter everything Iâ€™d come to believe in. Had I lost him before he was ever mine? Had this secret ruined any promise of a forever together? New Adult Contemporary Romance with **Mature Content** Recommended for 17+ due to mature language and adult situations.
author: Jessica Wood
